query:
SELECT c.id, c.name, c.startDate, c.endDate, 
       (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM courseEnrollments ce WHERE ce.courseId = c.id) as enrollments_count,
       (SELECT SUM(ce.amount) FROM courseEnrollments ce WHERE ce.courseId = c.id) as total_revenue
FROM courses c 
WHERE c.name LIKE '%تسويق%' OR c.name LIKE '%التسويق%'
ORDER BY c.startDate DESC;
